message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my initial asking price. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product. I hope this helps move us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
